issue.title: VMWare rendering: Z Ordering Appears Random

content.raw:
@vkpetkov You would need to recompile Gazebo from source. I am currently attempting to do that inside an Ubuntu 14.04 VM and I am following the instructions [here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=install_from_source&ver=default) but there are a lot of packages that are not in the 14.04 repos so I need to compile them from source (e.g. ign-msgs and ign-transport). The fixed mention doesn't seem to hold for old versions of Gazebo (e.g. 2.2). 

I will post back with my experience in the next few hours.
content.html:
@vkpetkov You would need to recompile Gazebo from source. I am currently attempting to do that inside an Ubuntu 14.04 VM and I am following the instructions here but there are a lot of packages that are not in the 14.04 repos so I need to compile them from source (e.g. ign-msgs and ign-transport). The fixed mention doesn't seem to hold for old versions of Gazebo (e.g. 2.2).

I will post back with my experience in the next few hours.
